subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Roy Jackson and his wife, Gretchen, own this year's Derby winner, Barbaro. But before Jackson made a splash in horse racing, he owned a couple of professional baseball teams.
snippet: Roy Jackson and his wife, Gretchen, own this year's Derby winner, Barbaro. But before Jackson made a splash in horse racing, he owned a couple of professional baseball teams.
